title: 3 Besties Are Here 2 Discuss Back 4 Blood
description:
We're without Chris Plante this week, but we're not without a surplus of zombie-based video games to discuss, because, wow, there's a LOT of them coming out right now. 

 

Games discussed include: Back 4 Blood, Resident Evil 4 VR, ElecHead, Inscryption, Metroid Dread, Dying Light on Switch, Final Fantasy X on Switch
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
